author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

This is a bug fix for the PPSProtonTransport, in the propagationg using Hector, which was causing all positive pz to be rotated to the negative side.

All the tests (code-checks, code-formats, runtests and runTheMatrix) have been done again with no problem at all.

title: Bug fix hector
